sentences.english: Watery town Wuzhen near Jiaxing, Zhejiang is very typical of Jiangnan taste.
sentences.chinese: 浙江嘉興附近的烏鎮，具有濃烈的水鄉風味。

sentences.english: Here is the Water Village Style Garden.
sentences.chinese: 我們來到的這個地方，是水鄉風情園。

sentences.english: China has many water towns, especially in the Yangtze river delta area.
sentences.chinese: 中國的水城水鄉多，尤其是在長三角這個地區。

sentences.english: Wuzhen Water Village style integrity, and maintain a complete pattern of Yangtze River Delta.
sentences.chinese: 烏鎮水鄉風貌完整，保持了完整的江南水鄉格局。

sentences.english: Wuzhen Water Village style integrity, and maintain a complete pattern of Yangtze River Delta.
sentences.chinese: 烏鎮水鄉風貌完整，保持了完整的江南水鄉格局。

sentences.english: Changzhou is a water country of the Jiangnan, canals criss-crossing, bridges legion.
sentences.chinese: 常州爲江南水鄉，河渠縱橫，橋樑衆多。

sentences.english: To Chen, these villages by the water were filled with the memories of his youth.
sentences.chinese: 對陳逸飛而言，江南水鄉更盛載他的少年回憶。

sentences.english: Suzhou in Jiangsu Province is a city of rivers and canals and also a city of gardens.
sentences.chinese: 江蘇的蘇州是個水鄉也是一個園林城市。

sentences.english: Jiangnan famous ancient town is unique, and it's a beautiful water.
sentences.chinese: 烏鎮是江南有名的古鎮，同時它是個很美的水鄉。

sentences.english: He restarted the creation of oil paintings, including the works depicting the scenery of water villages in Jiangnan.
sentences.chinese: 重新開始油畫創作，有江南水鄉風光等。

sentences.english: With same dream, and hearts connected together despite being so far apart.
sentences.chinese: 懷揣着共同的夢想，我們心連心暫別水鄉。

sentences.english: At the same time, the style and features of canal towns in south China also offer a unique narrative space to the vernacular novels.
sentences.chinese: 同時，江南水鄉又爲話本小說提供了別緻的敘事空間。

sentences.english: In the rivers and lakes, you can often hear the phrase "bag water" argument.
sentences.chinese: 在水鄉，你可常聽到“皮包水”的說法。

sentences.english: We come from the watery place your people call Venus.
sentences.chinese: 我們來自你們稱之爲金星的水鄉。
